title: Interactive Online Tutorials for Strengthening Foundational Information Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading skills and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Undergraduate social studies education conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Applies a formative assessment-driven feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can explain a three-step verification process for identifying credible information sources
Learners can use academic search tools to curate at least five key resources relevant to a given topic
Learners can apply four criteria for analyzing bias in information sources to write an evaluation report

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
